titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation for reforming and preuenting the frauds frequently practised, aswell in the ouer-weight of butter-casks, as in the false packing of butter.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, Printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie: And by the Assignes of Iohn Bill,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at Our Court at Theobalds, the thirteenth day of Nouember, in the tenth yeere of Our Reigne."
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
